resources.string: Random Tetris blocks will start spawning from the top at random x locations.\n
\nYou can move the Tetris block along the x-axes. To move a block you have to click on one of the sides of the Tetris block (Note that your mouse needs to be OUTSIDE of the block!!)
This android app is a simple version of the game Tetris.To start the game press -Play- button in the main menu.Once you are in game the game will start automatically. Below we describe how to play:
